title: Star Simulation VR Vive Game
description:
The person that is uploading this is definitely not the creator of this game, because by setting a precedent of it being free means something about trademarks, I don't know, copyright law is dumb.

Here is a Vive VR game I- mean he made. It's bad but it's getting better... kinda. Right now you just throw shuriken at snakes, spiders and a manticore. Think Ninja Indiana Jones who is a part of magical X-Com... sorta.



Star Simulation Early Alpha Pirate's Edition


MINIMUM: 
OS: Windows 7 
Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 
Memory: 16 GB RAM 
Graphics: Nvidia 970 GTX 
DirectX: Version 11 
Storage: 1 GB available space





If you want to support me, I mean him, or whatever, here is the steam link to the official version:


 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/516950/



I'll try to update regularly. If the torrent goes down and stops working send an email to:

bugs AT justamusingmyselfstudios.com



And I, who is definitely not he, will get another one up.


All I ask is to pop in to the steam discussion board and leave some feed back, too easy too hard, too quick too slow, that kind of thing. And khank you for giving it a whirl!
